body.name: EVER ADVANCED Foldable Wagons for Two Kids & Cargo, Collapsible Folding Stroller with Adjustable Handle Bar,Removable Canopy with 5-Point Harness Gray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 20 hrs 48 mins
features: 【EASY PUSH & PULL】This foldable stroller wagon features an fold-away stroller push handle on the back and the front is a 3-section telescopic lockable pull handle . This wagon is great for kids and also is capable of hauling oversized cargo because of the superior design .

【FOLD OR UNFOLD IN 5 SECONDS】This wagon’s compact design can fold into a mini size; One-step fold and unfold without any tools. You can storage it in a closet, garage, or in the trunk of any standard car. Easy dragging folding design can bring you a convenient outdoor experience.

【DESIGN FOR SAFETY】Made of premium 300D polyester fabric and high duty steel frame . A detachable canopy to provide shade for your kids. Featured a rear foot brake, 5-point safety belt ensures baby maximum safety , our folding wagons have the JPMA certified meet ASTM safety standard .

【DURABLE WHEELS】This wagons for kids is designed with 360° rotating front wheels and 12''easy-push rear wheels with one step foot brake . Four upgraded PU wheels with anti-shock system creates friction-free movement and smooth ride.

【VERSATILE USAGE】EVER ADVANCED kids wagon is extremely portable and can be stored or taken anywhere . It's perfect for kids; it is also a great Christmas, birthday or baby shower gift idea for your friends, family or any new parents.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EVER ADVANCED STROLLER WAGONS FOR KIDS Adventure awaits with our innovative stroller wagons! You'll have the freedom to travel anywhere and take it all on with these 2-in-1 offerings.
Perfect For Large Families--Goes Anywhere You Go

ARE STROLLER WAGONS WORTH IT? Hear me out… if you are a mama of toddlers or multiple littles, you need a stroller wagon. While strollers traditionally focus on transporting the child first and storage second, wagons do both simultaneously. They are the ultimate adventure-mobile allowing families to tote their children and all the gear needed for an outing.
PUSH OR PULL DESIGN FEATURES TWO MODES Previous page Next page It has handles on the front and back, allowing you to push or pull from either side, and they’re adjustable for height.
KEEP LITTLE ONES SFAE AND COMFORTABLE Previous page Next page
Ample Storage Space On All Sides of the Carriage There’s plenty of storage space, with a parent storage bag, pockets and a removable snack tray and cupholder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is so worth the money, and I am a cheapskate. My husband is 6’3” and I am 5’3”. The handle bars are so easy to adjust when we take turns pushing the kids. We hardly ever use the pull-lever because the push-bar is so easy. But the pull-lever adjusts high for my tall husband.We love the food tray for the kids. It clicks in kind of weird but you get used to it. I love how it can switch between the wagon or on the handles if you need it out of the way.So much storage! We don’t even pack a diaper bag.I have fit two 18-month olds and a 4 year old in here. The kids seemed comfortable. Most the time we have 2 kids and all their crap.It’s nice having the buckles for the really wiggly kid. But I don’t usually need to use it because the sides are so high up that the kids can’t really get out without help, so I feel like they are safe.The canopy is kind of hard to pop up. It seems like the cheapest part of it all. It doesn’t click in as easily as the rest of it does. But it does work once you can click it in, and it’s nice that it is stored on the stroller so you always have it with you. It seems waterproof? I’ve used it for shade and a rain cover.The brakes work great, even parked on inclines. Super easy to click with your feet. But they are so powerful, that to click the break off requires a little oomph. I partially unlocked it one time and it made a crazy sound when we pushed it. Fixed it by just in clicking it all the way. So the break is strong.The wheels are that strong foam material, so there’s no worries of popping a tire. And the wheels are large so it can roll up a curb with very little jostling for my kids. It rides smooth. I was surprised how easy it was to maneuver, especially for how long it is. It does alright offroading when you have to cross over grass or whatever.It collapses and locks in so it will stay collapsed. It’s easy to unlock it and set it up. Like, unclick the red lever, push the sides apart, and push down the center. It snaps into place. Boom, you’re ready. It folds up the front and back collapsed to each other so it’s the same height. It’s not super small, but it’s decently compact.It’s been easy to wipe up messes from kids.I’ve used it about two dozen times now these past couple of months. We’ve taken it on vacation, to amusement parks, around the neighborhood, parks, on dirt, grass, in wind, in rain, in sunny heat, etc. I absolutely love this wagon. It is the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile & Safe: EVER ADVANCED Foldable Wagon
reviews.reviewText: The EVER ADVANCED Foldable Wagon is an excellent choice for families on the go. It effortlessly accommodates two kids or cargo, with an adjustable handle bar and a removable canopy for comfort. The wagon's easy folding mechanism makes it incredibly convenient for storage and transport. Safety is a priority, featuring a 5-point harness and shock-resistant design, meeting ASTM safety standards. Durable, smooth-riding wheels enhance its practicality for various outdoor activities. A superb option for parents seeking a portable, safe, and versatile stroller wagon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars *UPDATED REVIEW!* A good deal!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I'm updating my original review. The company sent me a new wagon to try out, and I have to say, this wagon works much better! The pull handle extends all the way and is plenty long for me (5'11") and my husband (6'4"). I think the first one was stuck to a shorter length, but this handle works great. The canopy also pops in and stays in place. Our first walk outside it started raining on us. The kids were totally dry and the canopy seemed to repel water fairly easy. If it's absolutely storming, you will get wet, just fyi. But if you get caught in the rain, this can definitely help while getting to shelter.I LOVE how deep the wagon is. My 1 year old is a climber and loves to try to escape. This deep wagon straps her in and keeps her inside without a chance that she can lean over the edges and somehow escape. (She's Houdini reincarnated, I promise.) She can still see out and be engaged in our activities, but she isn't making any escape plans in this. 5 point padded harness is a plus!I put my 1 year old and my 4 year old in the wagon and they fit together great. My 4 year old is the size of a 7 years old, so there really is plenty of space. I've also put in my 1 year old with my 3 month old (just laying her down flat) and it still worked great. Nice and deep to keep everyone inside and plenty of leg/sitting space.Also, after testing about 5 other wagons/double strollers, this wagon definitely has the most storage space. It's easy to think, "I've got a wagon, so plenty of room to throw in everything." You'd be surprised how easy it is to run out of space. This wagon, however, has a cup/water bottle holder, pockets, a bag, and a few hidden zippered pouches. All very useful and needed when out and about. There are definitely places to keep things that you don't want your kids to be able to grab while riding along.The snack tray being outside of the wagon is still a little weird to me, BUT I do think this is the best value. I was shocked at how expensive wagons are, and I do feel like this stands up to all of them. Nice deep sitting area, two tall handles to push or pull, more than normal storage, and smooth ride. For the price, I don't think this can be beat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom of 4 here, this wagon is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: After 4 kids you learn what does and doesn't work. I've had umbrella stroller, jogging stroller, double jogging stroller.... Never enough room for storage and takes up way to much cargo space. I can pop the wheels and rear axle off in seconds and slide this bad boy in the floor under the baby's carseat behind the driver seat in my van instead of using up all my trunk space. Pushes easily on any terrain I've had it on (gravel, grass, pavement), turns on a dime, and looks classy. The sun shade is simple to put on and remove but only really works if the sun is directly overhead, I just keep a muslin swaddle blanket to hang from whatever side the sun is shining in. The pockets and built in bag are perfect for storing whatever you need. My baby loves it (6 months), I can buckle her in to sit or she can lay down and nap plus there is room for my 5 year old if he gets tired. I've used it many times as a pack and play of sorts when we are out and about. This is one of my #1 baby products now, I only wish I had one before baby #4!
